title: Transfer Back To NA?
body:
Can i transfer back to na? I only transferred to oceania to do the ocean week thing.
And i really do not want to pay 2600 RP just to get back to na. And nothing said warning! you will need to pay 2600 rp if you want to get back to na.

Pls pls put me back on NA. P


It was free. btw

replies.body:
Transfers are understood to be permanent. I'm not too sure what's going on in NA, but usually you have to pay some RP to get transfers to OCE.

It's the same vice-versa. I doubt you'll be able to get back for free.

If you want to try, though, make a support ticket explaining yourself. Maybe they will have mercy.
